abstract: The company’s chief executive, Robert A. Iger, has signed a contract to stay on in that job until March 2015, then leave the company completely in June of 2016.
snippet: The company’s chief executive, Robert A. Iger, has signed a contract to stay on in that job until March 2015, then leave the company completely in June of 2016.

headline.main: Disney's Iger to Step Down in 2015
headline.print_headline: Disney Deal Keeps Iger At the Top
